subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A two-out fly ball opened the door to a four-run eighth inning for the Padres against the Cubs. In Kansas City, snow forced a postponement of the Rays-Royals matchup.
snippet: A two-out fly ball opened the door to a four-run eighth inning for the Padres against the Cubs. In Kansas City, snow forced a postponement of the Rays-Royals matchup.
